headline: Progressive Reports January 2026 Results
summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Feb. 18, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) today reported the following results for the month ended January 31, 2026: January(millions, except per share amounts and ratios; unaudited)2026 2025 ChangeNet premiums written$6,735 $6,481 4 %Net premiums earned$6,921 $6,586 5 %Net income$1,163 $1,117 4 %Per share available to common shareholders$1.98 $1.90 4 %Total pretax net realized gains (losses) on securities$103 $109 (6)%Combined ratio 84.4 84

content.title: Progressive Reports January 2026 Results
content.summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Feb. 18, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) today reported the following results for the month ended January 31, 2026: January(millions, except per share amounts and ratios; unaudited)2026 2025 ChangeNet premiums written$6,735 $6,481 4 %Net premiums earned$6,921 $6,586 5 %Net income$1,163 $1,117 4 %Per share available to common shareholders$1.98 $1.90 4 %Total pretax net realized gains (losses) on securities$103 $109 (6)%Combined ratio 84.4 84
